name: Gates to Chaos
description:
All dreams have a meaning, but can they have consequences as well?

Iscar had lost his memory when he was found nearly dead by Imperial soldiers. They told him it was because of a building collapse, but facts can easily be overwritten if you don't remember your past.  In a world owned by order and discipline, living as the society expected him to, Iscar feels empty.

"What is my purpose on this planet?" He often asks himself.

Little he knows that a single miraculous dream will change his existence forever, and you shall be the one guiding him to Freedom!

Delve into an illusory world on the edge of collapse and discover what is left behind by the cause of the apocalypse: the Great Vortex. Explore the main areas, complete many challenges and find hidden treasures. You'll have to defend yourself from the monsters roaming the wastes and to defeat fierce bosses!

Featuring

  • 10 interconnected main areas and 20 challenge areas to explore!
  • A pixelated animated artstyle to give the proper indie game feeling!
  • Over 20 unique monsters that will test your fighting skills!
  • 4 menacing bosses that will surely kill you many, many times...
  • 23 original music tracks setting up an unique atmosphere~
  • Over 35 treasure chests that contain items to help you during your journey, including 9 documents that tell the story of the illusory world
  • A tragic story with a depressed protagonist that has hurtful memories to recover from the unconscious...
  • ...and a chimera waifu!

Developer's note: this is my first game I've ever finished making and I don't have much experience so please have some patience if you encounter bugs and be sure to tell me!
